actionCalls.description: Minimizing the utility for agents that has not contacted their Internal IT first-hand.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Contact_Internal_IT_First
actionCalls.label: ACT_Contact_Internal_IT_First

actionCalls.description: Minimize screen-flow as the issue was resolved thanks to article.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Minimize_Auto_Solved
actionCalls.label: ACT_Minimize_Auto_Solved

actionCalls.description: Minimizing the screen flow utility after flow completion.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Minimize_Flow
actionCalls.label: ACT_Minimize_Flow

actionCalls.description: After the confirmation screen, this minimizes the Functional Product Support Widget in the utility bar.
actionCalls.name: ACT_MinimizeConfirmation_Permission
actionCalls.label: ACT_MinimizeConfirmation_Permission

actionCalls.description: Minimize the flow when the running user does not have the Team Lead in their role name.
actionCalls.name: ACT_MinimizeflowNotTL
actionCalls.label: ACT_MinimizeFlowNotTL

actionCalls.description: Showing the case creation in the chatter feed and which user created the case before changing the owner to the Functional Product Support Queue.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Show_Case_Access_Permission_In_Chatter_Feed
actionCalls.label: ACT_Show_Case_Access_Permission_In_Chatter_Feed

actionCalls.description: Making a chatter post to the case created with information regarding the case to display who created it before updating the owner.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Show_In_Feed
actionCalls.label: ACT_Show_In_Feed

actionCalls.description: Showing the case description and who created it in the related chatter feed for the case.
actionCalls.name: ACT_Show_In_Feed_Auto_Solved
actionCalls.label: ACT_Show_In_Feed_Auto_Solved

assignments.description: Adding the record variable to the collection.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Affected_Agent_To_Collection
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Affected_Agent_To_Collection

assignments.description: Assigning the case id and the current user from the loop to a record variable.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Affected_Agent_To_Variable
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Affected_Agent_To_Variable

assignments.description: Adding the Content Version Records from the GET query to a collection variable to be able to display them in a data table. This is necessary when user loop back to the previous screen and the uploaded files input changes to not only display what has been uploaded latest but all files uploaded in the flow.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Content_Version_Records
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Content_Version_Records

assignments.description: Assigning Feedback values to the case that are being created at the end of flow.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Feedback
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Feedback

assignments.description: Assigning the Permission Sets to the variable SelectedPermissionSetIds, and Assigning the User Selected in the Lookup from the screen to the variable SelectedUserId.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_IDs
assignments.label: ASSIGN_IDs

assignments.description: Assigning templates and values for FPS Cases that are issues.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Issue
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Issue

assignments.description: Assigning templates and values for FPS Cases that are issues.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Issue_Auto
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Issue_Auto

assignments.description: Assigning the updated value to the case subject so the number of affected agents are easily displayed in the list.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Num_Value
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Num_Value

assignments.description: Assigning a value to a boolean based on a checkbox.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_Permission_Checkbox_Value
assignments.label: ASSIGN_Permission_Checkbox_Value

assignments.description: Assigning Current Item from Loop to a Single Record Variable.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_PermissionSet
assignments.label: ASSIGN_PermissionSet

assignments.description: Assigning the checkbox value in the screen component to the correlating boolean variable for use in the next decision.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_TeamLead_Checkbox_Value
assignments.label: ASSIGN_TeamLead_Checkbox_Value

assignments.description: Adding the values from the TeamLead contact screen input formula to a variable.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_TeamLead_In_SF
assignments.label: ASSIGN_TeamLead_In_SF

assignments.description: Adding the values from the TeamLead Contact screen input formula to a variable.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_TeamLead_Not_In_SF
assignments.label: ASSIGN_TeamLead_Not_In_SF

assignments.description: Assigning the user role ids to a collection variable.
assignments.name: ASSIGN_User_RoleIDs
assignments.label: ASSIGN_User_RoleIDs

assignments.description: Setting the choice values from the flow using a form to the variable.
assignments.name: SET_Choice_Values
assignments.label: SET_Choice_Values

assignments.description: Setting the choice values from the flow using a formula to the variable when the flow has been deflected.
assignments.name: SET_Choice_Values_Auto
assignments.label: SET_Choice_Values_Auto

assignments.description: Adding the Current iteration from the loop (Single Record Variable) into the filtered Record Collection Variable called PermissionCollection to display in the Data table screen.
assignments.name: STORE_PermissionSet
assignments.label: STORE_PermissionSet

choices.name: ch_Article_Access_NotResolved
choices.choiceText: I still need help granting access.

choices.name: ch_Article_Access_Resolved
choices.choiceText: The article helped me grant access.

choices.name: ch_Article_Debug_NotRetrieved
choices.choiceText: I did not manage to retrieve my CCP Debug Log.

value.stringValue: Debug Article did not solve issue

choices.name: ch_Article_Debug_Retrieved
choices.choiceText: I have retrieved my CCP Debug log.

value.stringValue: Internet deflect did not solve issue.

choices.name: ch_Article_Internet_Solved_Issue
choices.choiceText: I managed to solve the issue myself.

value.stringValue: Microphone article did not solve issue

choices.name: ch_Article_Microphone_Solved_Issue
choices.choiceText: I managed to solve the issue myself.

value.stringValue: Microphone is enabled in browser window.

choices.name: ch_Upload_AllFiles
choices.choiceText: I have uploaded all necessary files related to case.

choices.name: ch_Upload_MoreFiles
choices.choiceText: I wish to upload more files related to my case.

choices.name: ch_VDI_Outside
choices.choiceText: I am not using the VDI

decisions.description: Checking if the running user has contacted their internal IT Support.
decisions.name: CHECK_Contacted_Internal_IT
decisions.label: CHECK_Contacted_Internal_IT

decisions.description: Checking if the user has selected that they have downloaded debug logs or not.
decisions.name: CHECK_DebugLog_Downloaded
decisions.label: CHECK_DebugLog_Downloaded

decisions.description: Checks if User has Team Lead or SAS in their role name or not.
decisions.name: CHECK_IF_TeamLead_Or_SAS_Role
decisions.label: CHECK_IF_TeamLead_Or_SAS_Role

decisions.description: Checking the choice value of the previous screen if its positive or negative.
decisions.name: CHECK_Internet_Connection
decisions.label: CHECK_Internet_Connection

decisions.description: Checking if the running user has selected that their microphone in the browser window is enabled.
decisions.name: CHECK_Is_Microphone_Enabled
decisions.label: CHECK_Is_Microphone_Enabled

decisions.description: Checking if the user running the flow has selected remote or in office.
decisions.name: CHECK_Is_Remote
decisions.label: CHECK_Is_Remote

decisions.description: Checking if the issue was solved from the Internet connection related knowledge article.
decisions.name: CHECK_Issue_Solved_Internet
decisions.label: CHECK_Issue_Solved_Internet

decisions.description: Check if the issue has been solved by the knowledge article related to microphone.
decisions.name: CHECK_IssueSolved_Microphone
decisions.label: CHECK_IssueSolved_Microphone

decisions.description: Using a formula to check if the permission set is valid or not, to make sure we dont get any deleted permission sets rendered in the data table screen. Check formula for details.
decisions.name: CHECK_IsValid_PermissionSet
decisions.label: CHECK_IsValid_PermissionSet

decisions.description: Checking if the user selects that the permission set is not in the list.
decisions.name: CHECK_Permission_Not_In_List
decisions.label: CHECK_Permission_Not_In_List

decisions.description: Checking the request type and skipping loop if its feedback.
decisions.name: CHECK_Req_Type
decisions.label: CHECK_Req_Type

decisions.description: Checking for the selected permission sets from the data table in the screen.
decisions.name: CHECK_Selected_Rows
decisions.label: CHECK_Selected_Rows

decisions.description: Checking if the Team Lead for the affected agent(s) is not in salesforce.
decisions.name: CHECK_TeamLead_Not_In_SF
decisions.label: CHECK_TeamLead_Not_In_SF

decisions.description: Decision checking if the running user after having seen the files in the data table component wants to upload additional files.
decisions.name: CHECK_Upload_More_Files
decisions.label: CHECK_Upload_More_Files

decisions.description: Decision to check which product is related to the issue and display screens with relevant information.
decisions.name: DEC_KindOf_Issue
decisions.label: DEC_KindOf_Issue

decisions.description: Decision for determining which type of Functional Product Support request is being made.
decisions.name: DEC_RequestType
decisions.label: DEC_RequestType

Flow.description: Screen flow for the Functional Product Support. updating the permission set query to alter the data table. Updated flow temporarily removing experience cloud links in version 17, also further upgrades made.

formulas.description: Summary formula for all choices made in the issue screens radio button components, it checks that the value is not blank(that the user has passed through that screen) and then proceeds to add it to the summary.
formulas.name: form_All_Choices
formulas.expression:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Relog_Button})), 'Has relogged: ' & {!ch_Relog_Button} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Restart_Button})), 'Has restarted: ' & {!ch_Restart_Button} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_VDI_Screen})), 'VDI: ' & {!ch_VDI_Screen} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_ContactedInternal_IT})), 'Contacted Internal IT: ' & {!ch_ContactedInternal_IT} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_RemoteOrOffice})), 'Remote/Office: ' & {!ch_RemoteOrOffice} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_InternetConnection})), 'Internet Connection: ' & {!ch_InternetConnection} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Internet_Connection_Knowledge})), 'Knowledge Internet: ' & {!ch_Internet_Connection_Knowledge} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_ResetRouter_Button})), 'Reset router: ' & {!ch_ResetRouter_Button} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Wifi_Or_Cable})), 'WIFI/CABLE: ' & {!ch_Wifi_Or_Cable} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Microphone_Enabled})), 'Microphone Enabled: ' & {!ch_Microphone_Enabled} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Microphone_Enabled_Knowledge})), 'Knowledge Microphone: ' & {!ch_Microphone_Enabled_Knowledge} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_DebugScreen})), 'Downloaded Debug Log: ' & {!ch_DebugScreen} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_DebugLog_Download_Knowledge})), 'Knowledge Debug: ' & {!ch_DebugLog_Download_Knowledge} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_WebBrowser_Button})), 'Web Browser: ' & {!ch_WebBrowser_Button} & '
', '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!ch_Issue_Reoccurrence})), 'Issue reoccurrence: ' & {!ch_Issue_Reoccurrence} & '
', '')

formulas.name: form_TeamLead_In_SF
formulas.expression: 'Team Lead ' + BR() + "Name: " + {!Lookup_Select_Team_Lead.selectedChoiceLabels} + BR() + "User Id: " + {!Lookup_Select_Team_Lead.selectedChoiceValues} + BR() + "Email: " + {!Team_Lead_SF_Form_Email} & BR() + "Phone: " + {!Team_Lead_SF_Form_Phone}

formulas.description: Form for team leads related to the case that are not in salesforce.
formulas.name: form_TeamLead_Not_In_SF
formulas.expression: "First name: " + {!TeamLead_Form_First_Name} + BR() + "Last name: " + {!TeamLead_Form_Last_Name} + BR() + "Email: " + {!TeamLead_Form_Email} + BR() + "Phone: " + {!TeamLead_Form_Phone} + BR() + BR()

Flow.label: Case_SCR_ContactFPS

loops.description: Looping through the affected agents in S20.
loops.name: LOOP_Affected_Agents
loops.label: LOOP_Affected_Agents

loops.name: Loop_PermissionSets

loops.description: Looping through the permission sets in the data table in the previous screen to see which ones where selected.
loops.name: Loop_Selected_PermissionSets
loops.label: LOOP_Selected_PermissionSets

loops.description: Looping through the user role ids for the roles that should be able to be selected as team lead.
loops.name: LOOP_User_RoleIDs
loops.label: LOOP_User_RoleIDs

recordCreates.description: Creating records of affected agents related to the case.
recordCreates.name: CREATE_Affected_Users_Agents
recordCreates.label: CREATE_Affected_Users_Agents

recordCreates.description: Creating a case when auto resolving a case with articles to related to microphone issues.
recordCreates.name: CREATE_Case_Auto_Resolved

recordCreates.label: CREATE_FPS_Access_Case

recordCreates.description: Creating up the FPS Case whether its issue or feedback related.
recordCreates.name: CREATE_FPS_Issue_Feedback_Case
recordCreates.label: CREATE_FPS_Issue_Feedback_Case

recordLookups.description: Retrieving the Content Version Ids from the previous screen to be able to display them in the next.

recordLookups.label: GET_Content_Version

recordLookups.description: Getting the group id for the FPS Group.
recordLookups.name: GET_FPSGroupId
recordLookups.label: GET_FPSGroupId

recordLookups.description: Getting the record type id for Functional Product Support.
recordLookups.name: GET_FPSRecordTypeId
recordLookups.label: GET_FPSRecordTypeId

recordLookups.description: Getting the group Id for Functional Product Support.
recordLookups.name: GET_GroupId_Access
recordLookups.label: GET_GroupId_Access

recordLookups.description: Getting the group Id for functional product support in order to change the owner after the record has been created.
recordLookups.name: GET_GroupId_Case_Auto
recordLookups.label: GET_GroupId_Case_Auto

recordLookups.description: Getting the Permission Sets that are not Standard and that has an Id too display in the data table.
recordLookups.name: GET_PermissionSets
recordLookups.label: GET_Permission_Sets

recordLookups.description: Getting the record type Id for the Functional Product Support record type.
recordLookups.name: GET_RecordType_Access
recordLookups.label: GET_RecordType_Access

recordLookups.description: Getting the record type for functional product support in order to assign that to the record.
recordLookups.name: GET_RecordType_Case_Auto
recordLookups.label: GET_RecordType_Case_Auto

recordLookups.name: GET_User_Roles
recordLookups.label: GET_User_Roles

recordLookups.name: GET_Users
recordLookups.label: GET_Users_In_UserRoleIds

recordUpdates.description: Updating the case owner to the Functional Product Support Queue to display it in the list view. Also updating the subject to show how many users are related to the case.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_Access_Case
recordUpdates.label: UPDATE_Access_Case

recordUpdates.description: Updating the owner to the functional product support queue, to display it in the list view where it can be picked up. Updating the subject to dynamically
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_Case_Owner
recordUpdates.label: UPDATE_Case_Owner

recordUpdates.description: Updating the case owner to Functional Support to display the case in the list view when case has been automatically solved.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_Case_Owner_Auto_Solved
recordUpdates.label: UPDATE_Case_Owner_Auto_Solved

recordUpdates.description: Running the update on the case subject field to display how many agents have been affected.
recordUpdates.name: UPDATE_Case_Subject
recordUpdates.label: UPDATE_Case_Subject

screens.description: Form screen for input to determine the type of case and relevant field based on what type of case is created.
screens.name: S01_Enter_Issue_Information
screens.label: S01_Enter_Issue_Information

fields.name: AccessDescription
fields.helpText:
Please give a description of

  1. What access you need.
  2. For what purpose.
  3. Who needs the access.

fields.name: IssueProduct
fields.fieldText: What is the issue related to?
fields.helpText: Select the product that you want to report an issue for, if it is not in the list you can select "Other"

fields.name: IssueDescription
fields.fieldText: Please give a detailed description of your issue and where you experienced it.
fields.helpText: Include products, what happened, expected outcomes, error messages, and steps to reproduce

fields.name: Date_Time_Of_Issue
fields.fieldText: Please specify date and time you acknowledged the issue

fields.name: IssueLink
fields.fieldText: Please provide a link to where the issue occured

fields.name: IssueCaseNumber
fields.helpText: If the issue is related to a case please provide us with the case number.

fields.name: FeedbackProduct
fields.fieldText: What is the feedback related to?
fields.helpText: Please select the product that your feedback is related to, if not in the list select "Other"

fields.name: FeedbackImpact
fields.helpText: Please describe the business impact of the suggested feedback

fields.name: FeedbackLink
fields.helpText: If the feedback is for a website or a page, please insert the URL here.

screens.description: Screen Deflecting users who does not have the team lead role to contact their team leads for application of additional access.
screens.name: S02_ContactTeamLead
screens.label: S02_Contact Team Lead

fields.name: Text_For_Agent
fields.fieldText:
Please contact your Team Lead regarding applying for necessary additional access.



Have a good day!

Best Regards, IT

screens.description: Screen to give the running user some information about
screens.name: S02_Question_Information_Screen
screens.label: S02_Question_Information_Screen

fields.name: Text_Ask_Questions
fields.fieldText:
In order to help you troubleshoot your issue we will now ask you some questions.


Depending on your answers you will automatically skip questions or get provided with additional information on how to solve your issue, please answer honestly.

screens.description: Screen where the running user can choose which USER that needs additional permission sets, and which PERMISSION SETS they need.
screens.name: S02_SelectUser_And_PermissionSets
screens.label: S02_SelectUser_And_PermissionSets

fields.name: Data_Table_Text
fields.fieldText: Select up to 10 users that need access, and then the access they need through the permission sets.

fields.name: ch_Permission_Not_In_List
fields.fieldText: I cannot see the access i need to assign in the list

fields.name: text_What_access
fields.fieldText: Please give more clarification of what access you need.
fields.helpText: Make sure to be very clear with the access you need for you or your agents so we can assign it as soon as possible.

screens.description: Confirmation screen for user running the flow that their access request case has been created.
screens.name: S03_Access_Request_Sent_Confirmation
screens.label: S03_Access_Request_Sent_Confirmation

fields.name: Approval_text
fields.fieldText:
Your request for approval has been submitted. You will get informed of the decision for assigned permission sets shortly.


Best Regards


IT

screens.description: Screen to confirm user has logged out and in of salesforce.
screens.name: S03_Relog_Screen
screens.label: S03_Relog_Screen

fields.name: Relog_Text
fields.fieldText: Have you tested logging out and in of salesforce?

screens.description: Screen confirming if user has restarted their computer.
screens.name: S04_Restart_Screen
screens.label: S04_Restart_Screen

screens.description: Screen asking running user if they are working inside the VDI or outside of it.
screens.name: S05_VDI_Screen
screens.label: S05_VDI_Screen

fields.name: VDI_Header
fields.fieldText: Are you taking the calls in the VDI?

fields.name: VDI_Text
fields.fieldText: If you are try to work outside the VDI if you are currently working outside the VDI please try switching to using the VDI.

screens.description: Screen asking whether the running user has contacted their internal support.
screens.name: S06_Contacted_Internal_IT
screens.label: S06_Contacted_Internal_IT

fields.name: Text_ContactedInternalIT
fields.fieldText:
Have you contacted your internal IT Support?


Please always do that first-hand before contacting us.

screens.description: Screen asking if the running user is sitting remote or in office.
screens.name: S07_Are_You_Remote
screens.label: S07_Are_You_Remote

fields.name: Remote_Text
fields.fieldText: Are you working in office or remote?

screens.description: Screen Deflecting users who has not contacted their Internal IT first.
screens.name: S07_Contact_Internal_IT_First
screens.label: S07_Contact_Internal_IT_First

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Text_InternetIssueSolved
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for contacting your internal IT first to troubleshoot your issue. If the problem persists please proceed to make a case to us.


We wish you a good day!


Best Regards, IT

screens.description: Screen asking the running user if their internet connection is good or bad.
screens.name: S08_Internet_Connection
screens.label: S08_Internet_Connection

screens.description: Screen with a link to knowledge base where we display answers to FAQ and guide how to assign access.
screens.name: S09_Internet_Knowledge_Link
screens.label: S09_Internet_Knowledge_Link

fields.name: Text_Internet
fields.fieldText:
Please proceed to run a speedtest.net and upload a screenshot of the results at the end of the interview of questions.


Best regards

IT

screens.description: Screen checking if remote running user has reset their router.
screens.name: S10_Reset_Router
screens.label: S10_Reset_Router

screens.description: Screen checking if remote running user is using wifi or cable.
screens.name: S11_WiFi_Or_Cable
screens.label: S11_WiFi_Or_Cable

fields.name: WifiCable_Text
fields.fieldText: Are you using Wi-Fi or Cable?

fields.name: WIFI_Cable_Text
fields.fieldText: If you have the ability to please try switching from Wi-Fi to cable or vice versa.

screens.description: Screen to confirm if running user has their microphone in the browser window enabled or not.
screens.name: S12_Is_Microphone_Enabled
screens.label: S12_Is_Microphone_Enabled

fields.name: Microphone_Text
fields.fieldText: Is your microphone enabled in the browser window?

screens.description: Screen with a link to knowledge base where we display answers on how to enable microphone in the web browser window.
screens.name: S13_Microphone_Knowledge_Link
screens.label: S13_Microphone_ Knowledge_Link

fields.name: Microphone_Text2
fields.fieldText:
Please make sure your microphone is enabled in your browser window.


Please make sure your microphone is turned on and working.



Best regards

IT

screens.description: Screen asking user if they have downloaded the CCP Debug logs.
screens.name: S14_DebugLog_Screen
screens.label: S14_DebugLog_Screen

fields.name: Debug_Text
fields.fieldText: Have you downloaded the CCP Debug logs from the widget?

screens.description: Screen confirming that the articles have helped the running user.
screens.name: S14_Issue_Auto_Solved
screens.label: S14_Issue_Auto_Solved

fields.name: Text_IssueAutoSolved
fields.fieldText:
We are glad to hear that your issue was resolved.


We wish you a good day!


Best Regards, IT

screens.description: Screen with a link to knowledge base where we display answers on how to enable microphone in the web browser window.
screens.name: S15_DebugLog_Knowledge_Link
screens.label: S15_DebugLog_Knowledge_Link

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Team_Lead_Text
fields.fieldText:
Please click the gear icon in the omni-channel widget, scroll down to the bottom of the settings and click "Download Debug Information" and then upload that file when prompted shortly.



Best regards

IT

screens.description: The user gives information about which web browser they are currently using while working.
screens.name: S16_Web_Browser
screens.label: S16_Web_Browser

fields.name: WebBrowser_Text
fields.fieldText: Which Web Browser do you use while you work?

screens.description: Screen asking the user if the issue they are experiencing is reoccurring or if its the first time.
screens.name: S17_Issue_Reoccuring
screens.label: S17_Issue_Reoccuring

fields.name: IssueReoccuring_Text
fields.fieldText: How often do you experience this issue?

screens.description: Screen for entering the team lead or supervisor if they are not a user in the salesforce org.
screens.name: S18_Enter_TeamLead_Supervisor
screens.label: S18_Enter_TeamLead_Supervisor

fields.name: Text_TeamLead
fields.fieldText: Please enter the contact information to your Team Lead/Supervisor on duty.

fields.name: Team_Lead_SF_Form_Email
fields.helpText: Please enter the Email adress that the person is currently using for contact.

fields.name: Team_Lead_SF_Form_Phone
fields.helpText: Please enter the phone number that the person is currently using for contact.

fields.name: ch_TeamLead_NotIn_SF
fields.fieldText: My Team Lead is not in Salesforce

screens.description: Screen for entering the team lead or supervisor if they are not a user in the salesforce org.
screens.name: S19_Enter_TeamLead_Supervisor_Not_In_Salesforce
screens.label: S19_Enter_TeamLead_Supervisor_Not_In_Salesforce

fields.name: Text_TeamLead_Not_In_SF
fields.fieldText: Please enter the contact information to a Team Lead/Supervisor on duty related to the case.

screens.description: Screen enabling the running user to enter the affected agents
screens.name: S20_Enter_Affected_Agents
screens.label: S20_Enter_Affected_Agents

fields.name: Form_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Please enter (up to 10) agents that has experienced this issue.

screens.description: Screen for uploading files related to the FPS Case.
screens.name: S21_Upload_Files_Screen
screens.label: S21_Upload_Files_Screen

fields.name: Please_Upload_Speedtest
fields.fieldText: Please upload a screenshot of your speedtest results.

fields.name: DebugLog_Text
fields.fieldText: Please upload your CCP debug log file that you download from the Omni-Channel widget.

fields.name: Please_Upload_Files
fields.fieldText:
Please upload relevant files and screenshots so that we can handle the case as swiftly and effectively as possible.


The files you upload will be visible in the next screen.

screens.description: Screen to display the files/screenshots that has been uploaded.
screens.name: S22_Uploaded_Files_Screen
screens.label: S22_Uploaded_Files_Screen

fields.name: Upload_File_More_Text
fields.fieldText: Please confirm that you have uploaded the necessary files for troubleshooting your issue.

screens.description: Screen confirming the user has created a case.
screens.name: S23_Success
screens.label: S23_Success

fields.name: Text_Success
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for contacting us, we will get back to you as soon as possible.


Kind regards,

IT

textTemplates.name: Access_Description_Template
BugTemplate
FeedbackTemplate
Issue_Agents_Template
textTemplates.text: Issue related to {!IssueProduct} reported for {!var_Affected_Users_Number} agent(s).

variables.description: Variable for storing the current users role name
variables.name: CurrentUserRoleName

variables.description: Number of affected users/agents entered in the flow.
variables.name: var_Affected_Users_Number
